actions.committee: Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs.

official_title: A Bill to recognize the boundaries of the Lake Traverse Reservation.
short_title: Lake Traverse Indian Reservation Recognition Act

summary.text: Lake Traverse Indian Reservation Recognition Act - Recognizes the external boundaries of the Lake Traverse Indian Reservation in North and South Dakota and directs that such reservation be restored as a Federal reservation for the use and benefit of the Sisseton-Wahpeton Sioux Indian Tribe.

titles.title: Lake Traverse Indian Reservation Recognition Act
A Bill to recognize the boundaries of the Lake Traverse Reservation.
